name: Flappy Ashot
description:
This game is a parody of Flappy Bird.  You need to fly between 2 pipes without touching them. Try to break my record of 3.

To jump you can use SPACEBAR or LMB or UP arrow.

ccsv helped me in development process, he drawed Ashot. Thank him!

(Game made in 24 hours)

LEADERBOARDS:
